alert.note: Alert for Redwood; Renville (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 9:58PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Minnesota River At Morton affecting Renville and Redwood Counties. .The combination of snow melt runoff and forecast rainfall will continue to increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River At Morton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Numerous roads flooded and impassable between the Minnesota River and Redwood Falls. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 900 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 25.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 900 PM CDT Friday was 25.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.5 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 27.3 feet on 03/25/2010. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
